title: Access your files, anywhere
description: The ability to use a smartphone, tablet, or computer to access your account means your files follow you everywhere

title: Security you can trust
description: 2-factor authentification and user-controlled encryption are just a couple of the security features we allow to help secure your files

title: Real-time collaboration
description: Securely share files and folders with friends, family and colleagues for live collavoration. No email attachments required

title: Store any type of file
description: Whether you're sharing holidays photos or work documents, Fylo has you covered allowing for all file types to be securelu store and shared
